channel.title: Conference on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents

item.title: FARFETCH is Sponsor of VISUM Summer School
item.description: FARFETCH is sponsoring VISUM summer school. iFetch team is happy to take part in this initiate by proposing a new project under the umbrella of information retrieval (with application on conversational agents) that VISUM applicants will need to address throughout the summer school.

item.title: New Publication at ACM MM 2020
item.description: We are happy to announce that our recent publication is now available at ACM digital library. Title: Adaptive temporal triplet-loss for cross-modal embedding learning. Abstract: “There are many domains where the temporal dimension is critical to unveil how different modalities, such as images and texts, are correlated.

item.title: Multimodal Conversational AI - ACM Multimedia 2020 workshop
item.description: We are organizing a workshop at ACM Multimedia 2020 - Multimodal Conversational AI (MuCAI). Conversational agents are now becoming a commodity as a number of companies push for this technology. The wide use of these conversational agents exposes the many challenges in achieving more natural, human-like, and engaging conversational agents.
